model

Class CommentMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CommentMap

  • public class CommentMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to store Comment Objects loaded from the server and able to return a list which can used by list view adapter construct
    Author:
    xuping

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentMap()
      Construct a empty CommentMap object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Empty this CommentMap and notify the ArrayAdapter data set has changed if ArrayAdapter has been set.
      Comment getComment(java.lang.String id)
      Get a specific Comment with its own id from the CommentMap.
      java.util.List<Comment> getCurrentList() 
      void setArrayAdapter( adapter)
      Set this CommentMap's ArrayAdapter.
      void updateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a Comment object in the CommentMap with its own id, if no Comment with the same ID exists, then added the Comment object to the CommentMap, notify the ArrayAdapter the data set has changed after update if the ArrayAdapter has been set.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentMap

        public CommentMap()
        Construct a empty CommentMap object

    • Method Detail

      • updateComment

        public void updateComment(Comment comment)
        Update a Comment object in the CommentMap with its own id, if no Comment with the same ID exists, then added the Comment object to the CommentMap, notify the ArrayAdapter the data set has changed after update if the ArrayAdapter has been set.
        Parameters:
        comment - a Comment object.

      • getComment

        public Comment getComment(java.lang.String id)
        Get a specific Comment with its own id from the CommentMap.
        Parameters:
        id - a String which is the comment id.
        Returns:
        the Comment object pointed by the comment id.

      • getCurrentList

        public java.util.List<Comment> getCurrentList()
        Returns:
        a unmodifiable list which contains all Comment objects in this CommentMap which can be used to construct a list view adapter.

      • setArrayAdapter

        public void setArrayAdapter( adapter)
        Set this CommentMap's ArrayAdapter.
        Parameters:
        adapter - which is a ArrayAdapter object.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empty this CommentMap and notify the ArrayAdapter data set has changed if ArrayAdapter has been set.
